name: 陳昶瑞
objective: LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design)為能源與環境先導設計，美國綠建築協會制訂之綠建築評估認證，本課程將提供LEED基礎概述和 LEED專業認證考試準備的說明，課程大綱主要為了解LEED綠建築評分認證系統之核心概念。另外課堂授課將會進行LEED專業認證考試準備課程和考前課題練習。
schedule:
Class Schedule:
1.　　Introduction to LEED Building Rating System
2.　　Project Requirements
3.　　Green Resources
4.　　Standards that Support LEED Credit
5.　　Credit Interactions
6.　　Credit Interpretation Rulings
7.　　Components of LEED Score Card
8.　　Strategies to Achieve Credit
9.　　Project/LEED/Property Boundary
10.　　Prerequisites for LEED Certification
11.　　Preliminary Rating
12.　　Project Site Factors
13.　　Water Management
14.　　Project Systems and Energy Impacts
15.　　Acquisition, Installation, and Management of Project Materials
16.　　Stakeholder Involvement in Innovation
17.　　Project Surroundings and Public Outreach
18.　　Final Exam
materials: Kibert, C.J. (2013). Sustainable Construction: Green Building Design & Delivery, 3nd Edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
